TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool Predicate<in T>(T obj);
.class public auto ansi sealed Predicate`1<- T> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Predicate(Of In T)(obj As T) As Boolean
generic <typename T> public delegate bool Predicate(T obj);

span.span: The type of the object to compare.

param.name: obj
param.span: 要按照由此委托表示的方法中定义的条件进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare against the criteria defined within the method represented by this delegate.

summary.span: 表示定义一组条件并确定指定对象是否符合这些条件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that defines a set of criteria and determines whether the specified object meets those criteria.

returns.span: 如果 符合由此委托表示的方法中定义的条件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if meets the criteria defined within the method represented by this delegate; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和类的多个方法使用此委托搜索集合中的元素。This delegate is used by several methods of the and classes to search for elements in the collection. 通常, 委托由 lambda 表达式表示。Typically, the delegate is represented by a lambda expression. 由于本地范围变量可供 lambda 表达式使用, 因此可以很容易地测试编译时不是确切已知的条件。Because locally scoped variables are available to the lambda expression, it is easy to test for a condition that is not precisely known at compile time. 下面的示例对此进行模拟, 其中定义了`HockeyTeam`一个类, 其中包含有关全国 Hockey 联盟团队和其成立年份的信息。This is simulated in the following example, which defines a `HockeyTeam` class that contains information about a National Hockey League team and the year in which it was founded. 该示例定义了表示年份的整数值的数组, 并将数组的一个元素随机分配给`foundedBeforeYear`, 该元素是本地作用域为该示例的`Main`方法的一个变量。The example defines an array of integer values that represent years, and randomly assigns one element of the array to `foundedBeforeYear`, which is a variable that is locally scoped to the example's `Main` method. 由于本地范围变量可用于 lambda 表达式, 因此传递给方法的 lambda 表达式可以为在该年份或之前的每个团队返回一个`HockeyTeam`对象。Because locally scoped variables are available to a lambda expression, the lambda expression passed to the method is able to return a `HockeyTeam` object for each team founded on or before that year. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicate1.vb#3)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 带有方法的委托来搜索结构数组。The following code example uses a delegate with the method to search an array of structures. 该示例显式定义一个名为`predicate`的委托, 并为其`FindPoints`分配一个名为的方法, 该方法在的产品和字段大于100000时返回`true` 。The example explicitly defines a delegate named `predicate` and assigns it a method named `FindPoints` that returns `true` if the product of the and fields is greater than 100,000. 请注意, 可以使用 lambda 表达式而不是显式定义类型的委托, 如第二个示例所示。Note that it is customary to use a lambda expression rather than to explicitly define a delegate of type , as the second example illustrates. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicateex2.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicateex2.vb#4)] 下面的示例与前面的示例相同, 不同之处在于它使用 lambda 表达式来表示委托。The following example is identical to the previous example, except that it uses a lambda expression to represent the delegate. `points`数组的每个元素都将传递给 lambda 表达式, 直到表达式查找满足搜索条件的元素。Each element of the `points` array is passed to the lambda expression until the expression finds an element that meets the search criteria. 在这种情况下, 如果 X `true`和 Y 字段的乘积大于 100000, 则 lambda 表达式将返回。In this case, the lambda expression returns `true` if the product of the X and Y fields is greater than 100,000. [!code-csharp[System.Predicate\`1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/cs/predicateex1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Predicate\`1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Predicate`1/vb/predicateex1.vb#2)]
